banner.title: Super Vision Camera
banner.subTitle: Next-generation high-performance AI camera LTechUVC High-Tech Supervision

title: A perfect long-distance video surveillance system that is not disturbed by low visibility or low-light situations.
text: A x35x optical zoom lens that allows long-distance surveillance beyond the limits of short-distance video surveillance, laser lighting to secure images up to 1km at night, and a built-in defog engine that provides clear images even in smog or bad weather, as well as a remote server and IP network.
